name: BraTSPipeline
description: Contact: software@cbica.upenn.edu. Further info: https://cbica.github.io/CaPTk/preprocessing_brats.html. Copyright  (c) 2022 University of Pennsylvania. All rights reserved. See https://www.med.upenn.edu/cbica/software-agreement.html
author: Sorina Pop
command-line: /work/CaPTk/bin/install/appdir/usr/bin/BraTSPipeline [T1C] [T1] [T2] [Fl] -o [OD] [SK] [BT] [PI]; ls -la [OD]; if [ [ALLRESULTS] != 1 ]; then tar -czvf [RESULTS] ./[OD]/*brainTumorMask_SRI.nii.gz ./[OD]/*T1_to_SRI_brain.nii.gz; else tar -czvf [RESULTS] [OD]; fi

inputs.name: appliOutputDir
inputs.description: Application output directory for final output

inputs.name: skullStrip
inputs.description: Flag whether to skull strip or not. Defaults to 1. This uses DeepMedic: https://cbica.github.io/CaPTk/seg_DL.html

inputs.name: brainTumor
inputs.description: Flag whether to segment brain tumors or not. Defaults to 1. This uses DeepMedic: https://cbica.github.io/CaPTk/seg_DL.html

inputs.name: patientID
inputs.description: Patient ID to pre-pend to final output file names. If empty, final output is of the form ${modality}_to_SRI.nii.gz
Bundle all results. Defaults to 1, which keeps all results in the final bundle. 0 only keeps brainTumorMask_SRI.nii.gz and T1_to_SRI_brain.nii.gz
inputs.name: bundleAllResults
